SA15dhkpvsvu:2356: 06601 ādir na ca vastv-ātmana ekasya tatra eva vṛttir
SA15dhkpvsvu:2359: 06603 syāt / sāmānyasya vṛttir na viśeṣasya iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2362: 06604 hi eka-rūpaṃ sāmānyaṃ vā bhavet viśeṣo vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2364: 06605 ayaṃ pravibhāgo yuktaḥ sati vā avyatireko na syād ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2365: 06606 tad ayam avibhāgo anviyād vā na vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2367: 06607 ca / yo api bhinnam eva sāmānyam āha / tasya api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2369: 06609 yathāsvaṃ śabdā bhinnam artham abhidadhānāḥ katham eka-artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2373: 06612 sarvatra bhāvād vyāvṛtter na ete doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ //136//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2374: 06613 yathā hy ekas tasmād bhinnas tathā anyo api iti bhedasya asāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2376: pariśiṣṭa-abhāvas tu prāg eva uktaḥ / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2381: 06619 yad rūpaṃ śābaleyasya bāhuleyasya na asti tat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2383: 06621 artha-abhedena ca vinā śabda-abhedo na yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2384: 06622 tasmāt tat-kāryatā api iṣṭā atat-kāryād eva bhinnatā //140//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2389: 06701 yo api manyate katham abhinnam artham antareṇa bahuṣv ekā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2390: 06702 śrutiḥ teṣām asāmyāt eka-vṛtter anyatra pratyaya-ajananāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2391: 06703 apratyāsattike ca pratyaya-utpāde atiprasaṅgāt teṣu ca eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2394: 06706 iti / tasya apy ekam asti ity eva lokena śabdo niveśanīyaḥ tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2395: 06707 vā ekam enāṃ śrutiṃ vastu-śaktyā eva dhvanayati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2397: 06708 kiṃ tarhi kenacit prayojanena kecic śabdāḥ kvacin niveśyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2398: 06709 tatra yady anekam ekatra upayujyeta tad avaśyaṃ tatra codanīyaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2399: 06710 tasya pṛthak pṛthak codane atigauravaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2404: kevalam anena tatra yogyās te arthāś codanīyāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2405: 06713 ta ekena vā śabdena codyeran bahubhir vā iti svātantryam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2407: tad iyam ekā śrutir bahuṣu vaktṛ-abhiprāya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2412: yadi hi na prayoktur icchā katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:2414: icchāyāṃ vā ka enāṃ bahuṣv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2423: 06722 śabdo bhinneṣu bhaved ity uktaṃ prāk /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2425: 06723 tu bhinnānām aviruddhā iti sa eva artha-abhedaḥ śabda-abhedasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2429: na punar eṣām anyā tat-kāryatā anyatra anyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2432: 06802 sambhave kuto rūpa-vijñānam iti vyavahāra-lāghava-arthaṃ kaścit
SA15dhkpvsvu:2433: 06803 sāṃketikīṃ śrutiṃ niveśayet yaro rūpa-vijñāna-hetuḥ śaso
SA15dhkpvsvu:2434: 06804 vā iti / api nāma sarveṣāṃ tad-hetūnāṃ sakṛt pratītir yathā syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2435: 06805 iti / na ca atra anugāmi kiṃcid rūpam asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2437: 06806 te bhāvā atad-arthebhyo bhinnā iti bheda eva eṣām abhedaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2440: 06808 kiṃcid ekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ tatra viśeṣa-abhāvād apārthikā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2441: 06809 viśeṣa-codanā iti sakṛt sarveṣāṃ niyojana-artham ekam ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2442: 06810 lokaḥ śabdaṃ teṣu niyuṅkte ghaṭa iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2451: na punar atra anyat kiṃcid yathā-varṇita-lakṣaṇaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2455: 06819 ye hetu-phala-viśeṣa-bhūtāḥ kiṃcid ekaṃ sādhayanti sādhyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:2456: 06820 vā te api sakṛt pratyaya-arthaṃ vrīhy-ādi-śabdaiḥ kṛta-saṃketāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2458: ye api pṛthak samastā vā kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2459: 06822 upayujyante ta avasthā-viśeṣa-vācibhiḥ sakṛd eva śabdaiḥ pratyaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2460: 06823 arthaṃ khyāpyante sanidarśanāḥ sapratighā vā iti tad-anyebhyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2467: 06902 bāhuleyaḥ prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtako vā iti / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2468: 06903 tat-kārya-pratiṣedhena apy acākṣuṣaḥ śabdo anityo anātma iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2473: 06906 ākāraṃ buddhāv āropya tad-vyavacchedena vyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2477: 06910 eka-vṛtter aneko api yady eka-śrutimān bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2478: 06911 na kevalam eka-kāryās tad-anya-bheda-aviśeṣād eka-śabdena ucyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:2479: 06912 api tv eka-vṛttyā apy aneka eka-śabdena ucyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2481: 06913 uktam atra / tasya upalabhya-abhimatasya anupalabdher abhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2483: 06915 ādayo na bhaveyur ity ādi / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2484: 06916 vṛttir ādheyatā vyaktir iti tasmin na yujyate //143//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2485: 06917 yad etad ekam anekatra vartamānam ekāṃ śrutiṃ vartayati
SA15dhkpvsvu:2498: tasya tatra samavāyād ādhāra iti cet ko
SA15dhkpvsvu:2501: 07002 tad eva idam anupakārakasya āśrayatvaṃ na sambhāvayāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2504: 07004 ādayo api vastu-sambandhāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvān na vyatiricyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2517: 07011 svātmany anupakurvāṇo anapekṣasya ādhāra iti yācitaka-maṇḍanam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2518: 07012 etat / kathaṃ tarhi idānīm ajanakaṃ kuṇḍaṃ badarāṇām
SA15dhkpvsvu:2522: 07016 prakṛtyā eva guruṇo dravyasya asamāna-deśa-kārya-utpādana dharmaṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2525: 07018 kṣaṇa-sahakāri kuṇḍaṃ tatra eva badara-kāryaṃ janayad ādhāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2526: 07019 ity ucyate / anyathā iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi ity api na syāt / na vai
SA15dhkpvsvu:2530: 07021 kiṃ punaḥ sa tayor eva saṃyogaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2532: 07022 vā / sa kim ekatra eva na samavaiti janyate vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2534: 07023 tad asamarthaṃ pṛthak tat sahitam api tādṛśam eva ity anupakārakatvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:2544: 07103 sambandhā janakasya eva upayoga-viśeṣa-vaśāt pravibhāgena kāryakāraṇabhāvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2549: 07107 na hy ayaṃ janana-viśeṣa-lakṣaṇa ādhāra-bhāvaḥ sāmānye sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2554: 07111 atha api syāt sthāpaka āśrayaḥ sāmānyasya tataḥ sthiti-hetutvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2558: 07113 patana-dharmāṇāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ pāta-pratibandhād ajanako api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2560: atra api yadi kaścit pratibandhaṃ na paryanuyuñjīta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2561: 07115 sa hi pāta-pratibandho na artha-antaram eva yaḥ sthāpayitrā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2562: 07116 kriyeta / artha-antaratve tatra eva asya upayoga iti kaḥ patataḥ pratibandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2563: 07117 pratibandhād apāte api tulyaḥ paryanuyogo anavasthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2564: 07118 vā / tasmāt pāta-abhāvaḥ pāta-pratibandhaḥ sa kathaṃ kenacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:2565: 07119 kriyate / abhāvaṃ karoti iti hi na abhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2568: 07121 nirdeśa eṣa bhāvaṃ na karoti iti yāvat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2570: 07122 kiṃcit karoti ity akiṃcitkaraś ca kaḥ kasya sthāpako nāma / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:2571: 07123 ayaṃ kenacid apratibaddha iti na kadācit tiṣṭhet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2573: 07124 pratibandha ity api kṣaṇikānāṃ bhāvānām upādāna-samāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2576: 07126 tat-karaṇād gatimato dravyasya kaścit sthāpako apy astu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2577: 07127 sāmānyasya akriyasya kiṃ-lakṣaṇāṃ sthitiṃ kurvāṇaḥ sthāpakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2578: 07128 syāt / sthitir hi tasya svarūpa-apracyutir eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2585: sā anyā cet tām eva sa āśrayaḥ karoti / sā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2586: 07203 ca apratibaddhā sāmānya iti kim sāmānyasya āśrayeṇa /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2593: jananaṃ cet kim āśrayeṇa apekṣitena anupakāriṇā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2594: 07207 apekṣā iti hi tat-pratibandhaḥ sa ca anādheyaviśeṣasya sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2597: 07209 abhede vā sthiteḥ sāmānyāt svarūpam eva tat tasya / tac ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2604: 07212 sāmānyasya avyaktasya vyaktyā jñāna-kāraṇatvāt tad-vyaktis tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2608: 07215 tad vyaṅgyaṃ yogyatāyāś ca kāraṇam kārakaṃ matam //146//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2609: 07217 prāg eva asya ca yogyatve tad-apekṣā na yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2611: 07219 na khalu vai kārakād vyañjakasya kaścid bhedaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2614: 07221 vā janayan bhāvam eva vyañjaka ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2616: 07222 janana-śaktir anākṣiptā janyasya iti janana-mātreṇa kārakatvam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2617: 07223 yo hi yato vijñāna-utpādana-yogyatāṃ pratilabhate sa cen
SA15dhkpvsvu:2619: sā asya svabhāva-bhūtā yogyatā prāg eva asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2622: 07226 sa eva tato bhavati iti sthiti-vat prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2624: 07227 taṃ karoti na apy anyam ity akiṃcitkaraś ca apekṣyata iti vyāhatam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2625: 07301 etat / nanv ajanakā api kāryatvād dhūma-ādayo vyañjakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2626: 07302 satyaṃ vyañjakā na tu dhūmam apekṣya agnir ātmani jñānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2627: 07303 janayati / tathābhūtasya agneḥ sākṣād ajanakatvāt / kevalam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2628: 07304 upādāna-balena eva tatra jñānam utpadyate na viṣaya-balena asaty
SA15dhkpvsvu:2632: 07307 balena utpattir vā iti niveditam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2634: 07308 viṣayāḥ sākṣād upayogena vijñānaṃ janayantas tatra param
SA15dhkpvsvu:2635: 07309 apekṣante te avaśyaṃ tata ātmānaṃ pratilabhante / na ca ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2642: 07313 svāśraya-samavetaṃ hi tad ātmany anyatra vā vijñāna-hetur iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2643: 07314 uktam atra ajanya-janakayoḥ ko ayam āśrayāśrayibhāva-lakṣaṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2646: 07316 eva syāt / tad-hetoḥ svabhāvasya prāg-abhāvāt paścāc ca tato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2647: 07317 bhāvāt / nityaṃ tat-svabhāva-sadbhāve prāg api samavāyād vijñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2652: 07320 añjana-āder iva vyakteḥ saṃskāro na indriyasya ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2654: 07322 saṃskṛtam añjana-ādibhir indriyaṃ pratipattau kiṃcid atiśayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2657: 07324 na evaṃ vyakter indriyasya kaścit saṃskāras tad-bhāva-abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2662: 07403 prāg adṛśye darśana-śakty-ādhānād upakāraka iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2664: 07404 arthaṃ darśayan kathaṃ na pratipatter bhedakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2668: 07406 saṃskārāt tad-darśane tad-vyaṅgyeṣu sāmānyeṣu kadācit aniścayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2671: 07408 vyakter yadi indriya-saṃskāro yadi na indriya-saṃskāraḥ sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2672: 07409 vijñāna-janana-svabhāva iti svabhāvād apracyuter anapekṣya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2680: yo hy eṣāṃ janaka ātmā sa tadā eva tato bhavati
SA15dhkpvsvu:2681: 07414 iti janyatā eva eṣāṃ parasparato apekṣā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2683: 07415 paraṃ nityaṃ tat-svabhāvaṃ kim iti indriyam apekṣate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2684: 07416 hi tasya kevalasya yo na tat-svabhāvaḥ sa punaḥ kathaṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2687: 07418 hetur ity api pāraṃparyeṇa vyakteḥ kāryam eva sāmānyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2689: 07420 vyañjakasya ca jātīnāṃ jātimattā yadi iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2691: 07422 yo hi yad-viṣaya-vijñāna-hetuḥ sa tasya vyañjakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2697: 07501 syuḥ / na hi vyakter api jñāna-hetutāṃ muktvā anyā kācid asty
SA15dhkpvsvu:2702: 07504 iti / samavāya-mātraṃ hi vyaktyā saha asya jātaṃ na anyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2704: pūrvavat paścād api na jñāna-hetuḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2705: 07506 samavāyād eva jñāna-hetutve svāśraya-samavāyinām anyeṣām api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2707: tasmāj jñāna-hetutā eva vyañjakatvaṃ / tac ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2708: 07508 tulyaṃ pradīpa-ādāv iti sa eva prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2711: avṛtter na anekatra jñāna-hetuḥ / ata eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2712: 07510 vyakter anyā athavā ananyā yeṣāṃ jātis tu vidyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2722: 07517 sā hi buddhir eka-bhāvinī vyakty-antaram evam āskanded bhūta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2723: 07518 grāhiṇī yadi tatra dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃcid anyatra paśyet / tac ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2727: svabhāvo hi svabhāvān na tattvam anyatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2730: 07523 eva khalu rūpasya anyatvaṃ yan na tad ākāra-antara-vad aviśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2731: 07524 tac cet sāmānyasya rūpam ananyat tad eva tad bhavati / atattve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2738: 07601 kvacid anāśrayād anyasya api vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāva-ādeḥ sambandhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2743: 07604 darśanena eka-vṛtteḥ pratyayasya anyatra vṛttim icchaṃs tattvānyattve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2748: 07607 prakṛtiś ca tasya āśraya iti nirloṭhitam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2753: 07610 vijñāna-santateḥ sarva-artha-darśaneṣv anapekṣya api tad-bhedaṃ tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2757: na hi teṣv atathābhūteṣu kiṃcid vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2763: tena avaśyaṃ hi tatra bhedo nāntarīyakatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2764: 07617 eṣṭavyaḥ / sa eva sāmānya-kārye paryāpta iti niḥprayojanā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2766: yadi satsv asatsu vā bhāveṣu sāmānya-buddhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:2767: 07619 na iyam arthavatī kevalaṃ viplava eva iti na asmākam asyā viṣaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2768: 07620 nirūpaṇaṃ prati kaścid ādaraḥ kvacid avisaṃvādo asyā vastuni
SA15dhkpvsvu:2770: 07622 pratyakṣa-vad atathābhāve api bhāvād iti nivedayiṣyāmo niveditaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2771: 07623 ca / bheda-viṣayatvaṃ punar asyā bahulaṃ bhinna-padārtha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2775: api ca ayaṃ sāmānyam artha-antaraṃ kalpayan
SA15dhkpvsvu:2776: 07701 svāśraya-mātra-gataṃ vā kalpayet sarva-gataṃ vā ākāśa-ādi-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2779: 07704 sambhavaḥ / yasmāt tat pūrva-dravyād utpitsu dravyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2782: na hy anya-dravya-vṛtter bhāvasya tato avicalato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2785: 07709 na ca tatra āsīt asti paścān /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2786: 07710 na ca tatra utpanno na kutaścid āyāta iti ka imaṃ vyāghāta-bhāram
SA15dhkpvsvu:2787: 07711 udvoḍhuṃ samartho anyatra jāḍyāt / api ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2793: 07716 bhinna-deśayor hi bhāvayoḥ sambandho dvidhā bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2797: na hi sa avayavatvam antareṇa bhinna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2802: ekasya ādheyasya tatra sthānaṃ tadā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2803: 07722 tatra tena eva ātmanā asthānam iti tat-sthita-asthita-ātmanor ekasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2807: 07803 syāt / tathā ca gām apy aśva iti pratīyāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2816: 07809 svasmād acalataḥ sthānād vṛttir ity atiyuktimat //153//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2817: 07810 yatra asau vartate bhāvas tena sambadhyate api na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2818: 07811 tad-deśinaṃ ca vyāpnoti kim apy etan mahādbhutam //154//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2820: yasya tu sarva-gataṃ sāmānyaṃ tasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2821: 07813 vyaktā eva ekatra sā vyaktyā abhedāt sarvatragā yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2823: 07815 na jāter nityāyāḥ kācid vyaktir iti niṣiddham etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2825: 07816 anapekṣita-para-upaskārā dṛśyeta vā na vā kadācit tasmin svabhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2829: 07818 api vyaktiṃ vyāpiny ekatra vyaktyā bheda-abhāvād vyaktā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2830: 07819 eva sarvatra iti vyakti-śūnyeṣv api pradeśeṣu dṛśyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2836: 07825 āśraya-śūnyeṣu pradeśeṣu na dṛśyata iti pratisamādadhīta tasya apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:2837: 07826 asty eva āśraya-indriya-saṃyoga upakāraka iti tatas tad-darśī yathā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2839: na hi tasyāṃ dṛśyamānāyām adṛṣṭaṃ tadīyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2845: 07904 hi vyañjakaḥ pradīpa-ādiḥ svarūpa-śūnye deśe sva-vyaṅgyaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2853: api ca anena kim asambhavad abhisamīkṣya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2856: 07910 vyatirekiṇīṣu vyaktiṣv anvayinaḥ pratyayasya ayogāt / katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:2858: 07912 pācaka-ādiṣv abhinnena vinā apy arthena vācakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2861: na hi teṣv anyad ekam abhinnam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2866: kim idānīṃ karmaṇā anyena vā / bhinnam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2867: 07917 abhinna-pratyaya-hetur na bhavati ity ekaṃ sāmānyam iṣṭam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2868: 07918 tad yadi bhinnam api karma-abhinnam pratyayaṃ janayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2870: 07919 ko aparādhaḥ kṛto yena tās tathā na iṣyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2872: 07920 asya idam iti vyatireka-pratītir atad-ākāra-viśeṣavatī ca na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2874: uktam atra yathā vyatireko viśeṣa-pratyayāś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2882: 08001 na hy artha-antara-sambandhinī jātir artha-antare pratyaya-hetur
SA15dhkpvsvu:2884: pācaka-karmasu ca karma-jātir na ca tāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:2890: 08006 ca pākaḥ pāka iti hi tataḥ syān na punaḥ pācaka iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2894: 08009 na hy anityaṃ karma sarvadā asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2896: 08010 niruddhe karmaṇi na pācaka ity ucyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2899: 08012 asambandhān na sāmānyaṃ na ayuktam śabda-kāraṇam //158//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2901: 08014 vinaṣṭe hi karmaṇi tat sāmānyaṃ na karmaṇi na kartari iti sambaddha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2902: 08015 sambandhe apy asya na asti ity asambandhān na śabda-jñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2909: 08021 asad hi nirupākhyaṃ kathaṃ nimittaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2914: anyac ca vyakty-ādikaṃ na iṣṭam ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:2916: tathā ca na jāti-siddhis tasyā jñāna-abhidhānayoḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2919: 08105 na karma na sāmānyam iti cet
SA15dhkpvsvu:2921: 08107 na hi śaktir nāma kiṃcid anyad eva pācaka-ādīnām / tasyā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2923: 08109 tasya upayoga iti cet kim idānīṃ śaktyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2928: 08112 eva upayujyata iti kiṃ na iṣyata iti kim antarāle anarthikayā śaktyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2929: 08113 tasmāc śaktir iti dravyam eva tat-kāryaṃ tac ca na anveti iti / tato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2931: 08115 sāmānyaṃ pācakatva-ādi yadi prāg eva tad bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2932: 08116 vyaktaṃ sattā-ādi-van no cen na paścād aviśeṣataḥ //160//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2933: 08117 atha api pācakatvam iti sāmānyam eva kiṃcid bhavet / saty arthe
SA15dhkpvsvu:2936: 08119 syāt / yāvanti hi sāmānyāny arthe samavāya-dharmāṇi tāni saha
SA15dhkpvsvu:2939: 08121 paścād apy aviśeṣān na tat-samavāyaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2941: 08122 vaiguṇyād hi sa tasya prāṅ na āsīt tatra eva ca asya svabhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2942: 08123 sthitasya paścād bhavati iti duranvayam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2944: 08125 na apekṣa-atiśaye apy asya kṣaṇikatvāt kriyā kutaḥ //161//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2945: 08126 karma-upakāram apekṣya pācakatvaṃ dravyeṇa vyajyata iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2946: 08201 sthira-svabhāvasya anatiśayād aviśeṣa-ādhāyini kā apekṣā / atiśaye
SA15dhkpvsvu:2947: 08202 vā kṣaṇikatvāt karmaṇaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ svabhāva-bhūtasya anyānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2948: 08203 atiśayasya utpattes tad api kṣaṇikaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2950: 08204 kriyā kutaḥ yad-apekṣaṃ vyañjakaṃ syāt / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2951: 08205 tarhi idānīm asty abhinne vastuni jñāna-śabdayor anvayinor vṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2953: nanu tad eva idaṃ cintyate kathaṃ teṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:2954: 08207 api iti / cintitam etad yathā na teṣu sambhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2962: 08210 na punar vikalpa-abhidhānayor vastu-sattā samāśraya ity ukta-prāyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2964: 08212 aparāpara-darśane apy anvayinos tayor darśanāt / na ca tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2965: 08213 tan-nibandhanaḥ kaścit svabhāvo asti paraspara-virodhinor yugapad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2969: 08215 bhavat kvacid bhavati kvacin na bhavati iti niyamam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2970: 08216 arhati / na khalu vai tad animittaṃ vāsanā-viśeṣa-nimittatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2971: 08217 bāhyaṃ tu tathābhūtaṃ dṛśyaṃ na asti iti brūmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2976: 08220 ca te asatsu utpadyanta iti sarvatra sarva-ākāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2979: uktaṃ ca atra kiṃcid asmābhiḥ prakṛtyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2980: 08222 api kecid eka-jñāna-kāryāḥ svabhāva-bhedād iti / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2981: 08223 tulye bhede yayā jātiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2982: 08224 kvacin na anyatra sa eva astu śabda-jñāna-nibandhanam //162//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2984: 08226 na nivṛttiṃ vihāya asti yadi bhāva-anvayo aparaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2985: 08227 ekasya kāryam anyasya na syād atyanta-bhedataḥ //163//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2986: 08228 yady ete bhāvā vyāvṛttiṃ muktvā svabhāvena kenacid anvayinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2987: 08301 śūnyāḥ / na eṣāṃ bahūnām ekaṃ kāryaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2989: 08302 janakaḥ / na hi so anyasya asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2990: yo asti sa na janako vyatirekas ya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2993: 08304 ca aparatra na asti iti na aparaṃ janayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2994: sa hi tasya svabhāvo yo janakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2998: 08307 yady ekātmatayā anekaḥ kāryasya ekasya kārakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2999: 08308 ātmā ekatra api so asti iti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ //164//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3000: 08309 yady eka-svabhāvatvād aneka ekasya kārakaḥ sa teṣām abhinnaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3004: 08312 na apaity abhinnaṃ tad-rūpaṃ viśeṣāḥ khalv apāyinaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3005: 08313 na hi tasya abhinna-svabhāvasya artha-antare viśeṣo asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3007: 08314 hāneḥ / sa ca tatra apy asti iti na eka-sthitāv api tasya apāyo asti / ye
SA15dhkpvsvu:3008: 08315 viśeṣās teṣāṃ saha-sthiti-niyama-abhāvāt syād apāyaḥ / na ca te
SA15dhkpvsvu:3016: 08320 tat-kāryam aneka-sahakāri-sādhāraṇam eka-viśeṣa-apāye api na bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3017: 08321 punar apy avikaleṣu sarveṣu viśeṣeṣu bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3020: kāryaṃ hi kutaścid bhāva-dharmi yan na bhavati
SA15dhkpvsvu:3024: avikale api tasminn abhavat tasya ajanaka-ātmatāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3027: tasmin sati niyamena bhavatas tad-anyasmād utpatti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3030: 08403 sāmānyaṃ / tatas ta eva vastu / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3031: 08404 sa pāramārthiko bhāvo ya eva arthakriyā-kṣamaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3032: 08405 idam eva hi vastv-avastunor lakṣaṇaṃ yad arthakriyā-yogyatā ayogyatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3036: 08409 na anveti yo anveti na tasmāt kārya-sambhavaḥ //166//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3037: 08410 tasmāt sarvaṃ sāmānyam anarthakriyā-yogyatvād avastu / vastu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3038: 08411 tu viśeṣa eva tata eva tan-niṣpatteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3040: 08412 ekasya janakaṃ rūpam anyasya na asti ity ajanakaḥ syāt / janakatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3043: 08414 tena ātmanā hi bhede api hetuḥ kaścin na ca aparaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3045: 08416 ekasya janakād ātmano bhidyamānāḥ sarve samaṃ janakā na vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3046: 08417 aviśeṣe kaścid iti syād etad yady eṣāṃ na viśeṣaḥ sambhavet / tato bheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3047: 08418 api kutaścid ātma-atiśayāt kaścij janako na aparaḥ / sa hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3050: 08420 arhanti kim agnir dahaty uṣṇo vā na udakam iti / etāvat tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3054: tasmāt svabhāvo asya sva-hetor ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3055: 08423 tasya api taj-janana-ātmatā tad-anyasmād ity anādir hetu-paraṃparā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3056: 08501 bhinnānāṃ hi kaścid hetur na anyaḥ svabhāvād ity atra na kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3059: 08504 abhedāt / svabhāvena eva viśvasya svātma-vad vibhāga-utpatti-sthiti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3060: 08505 nirodha-ādayo na syuḥ tathā upalakṣaṇād abhedasya / idam eva hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3061: 08506 bheda-abheda-lakṣaṇam eka-ākārasya api vyatireko avyatirekaś ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3063: 08508 bhedo api tena na evaṃ ced /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3064: 08509 na vai sarva-ākāra-avyatirekaṃ brūmo yena evaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3066: 08510 bhinno na anya iti bhedān na sahotpatty-ādayaḥ / evaṃ tarhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3069: 08513 bhedaḥ / sthāna-asthānayor ekātma-āśrayatve ko anyo dharmo bhedaka
SA15dhkpvsvu:3070: 08514 iti nānātvam eva kvacin na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3072: 08515 abhyupagamān nāma kevalaṃ na iṣṭaṃ syān na vastv
SA15dhkpvsvu:3073: 08516 ity uktam / tad ime na ekayogakṣemā bhāvāḥ bhinnā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3075: 08518 tad idam artha-antaram anāyattam ajanyatvād asya idaṃ sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3076: 08519 bhedo vā iti vyapadeśaṃ na arhati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3080: 08522 na hy anyāpoho nāma kiṃcit tasya ca svabhāva-anuṣaṅgiṇyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3082: 08524 upaplavaś ca sāmānya-dhiyas tena apy adūṣaṇā //169//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3083: 08525 nirviṣayam eva khalv idaṃ mithyā-jñānaṃ yad anekatra eka-ākāram
SA15dhkpvsvu:3084: 08601 iti na tad-viṣayasya abhāvāt sthitir asthitir vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3087: 08603 yat tasya janakaṃ rūpaṃ tato anyo janakaḥ katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3088: 08604 tatra na brūmo anyasya taj-janakaṃ rūpaṃ na asti iti / kiṃ tarhi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3089: 08605 yad ekasya taj-janakaṃ tad anyasya na ity anyo api svarūpeṇa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3092: 08607 ca svabhāvena iti ko atra virodhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3095: tena eva ca tat-kāryaṃ kartavyam iti ko
SA15dhkpvsvu:3098: 08611 ity uktam / na ca te viśeṣās tena ātmanā parasparam anuyanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3099: 08612 yad ekasya janakaṃ rūpam anyasya tan na asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3103: 08615 syād etat satyaṃ viśeṣā janakāḥ na punas teṣāṃ viśiṣṭam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3104: 08616 rūpaṃ kiṃ tv abhinnam api tad-eka-śakti-yogāj janakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3106: 08618 saty api sāmānye rūpe na tena te janakās tasya anapāyād eka-sthitāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:3107: 08619 api kārya-utpatti-prasaṅgād ity uktaṃ prāk / kiṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3112: 08623 sarva-arthān manyate tasya ayam artheṣu buddhi-pratibhāsa-bhedo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3116: tathā ca ayaṃ pravibhāgo na syād ekātma-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3121: 08701 sa eva arthas tasya vyāvṛttayo apare //170//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3122: 08702 tat-kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca uktaṃ tat svalakṣaṇam iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3124: 08704 yad arthakriyākāri tad eva vastv ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3126: 08705 yat punar etat sāmānyaṃ nāma tat tasya eva aparasmād bhedaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3127: 08706 na hi tasya arthatve dṛśyasya rūpa-anupalakṣaṇaṃ yuktam / tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3129: 08708 yathā abheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaṃ sarva-sādhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3130: 08709 tathā bheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaṃ sarva-sādhanam //173//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3131: 08710 yad uktam / kathaṃ taj-janaka-svabhāvād bhinno asya janakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3132: 08711 syāt / janakatve vā aviśeṣāt sarvo janakaḥ syād iti / uktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3133: 08712 atra / yady aviśeṣaḥ syāt syād etad iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3135: 08713 abheda-vādino abheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaḥ sarvasya janaka iti tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3137: 08715 bhede hi kārakaṃ kiṃcid vastu-dharmatayā bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3138: 08716 abhede tu virudhyete tasya ekasya kriyā-akriye //174//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3140: 08718 eva kārakāḥ syuḥ na anye atat-svabhāvatvād ity atra na eva kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3142: ekatve tu tasya tatra eva tathā kārakatvam akārakatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3144: 08721 bhedo apy asty akriyātaś cen na kuryuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3145: 08722 na vai sarva-ākāra-avivekaṃ brūmo bhedasya api bhāvāt / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3149: 08725 paryāyeṇa atha kartṛtvaṃ sa kiṃ tasya eva vastunaḥ //175//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3150: 08726 atha api syān na eva kaścid akārako asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3152: 08727 upayogāt / śakter vā vipariṇatāyās tan-niveśinyā rūpa-antareṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3153: 08728 upayogāt / sa eva khalv ayaṃ paryāyo bheda-āśraya ekasya katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3156: 08802 hānir iti yat kiṃcid etat / kiṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3159: 08805 bhāvāś ced abhinnena ātmanā svātmabhūtena bhedinas tadvantaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3160: 08806 syuḥ tad-abhinna-svabhāva-ātmatvād bhedasya api kutaḥ parasparaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3161: 08807 bhedaḥ / atha na sa tasya samāna ātmā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3163: 08808 tena api na yuktaṃ tathā bhavitum /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3166: na hy ayaṃ pravṛtti-nivṛttimān svabhāva eko yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3169: 08812 na hi kvacid asya ekāntiko bhedo abhedo vā vivekena vyavasthāpanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3172: 08815 bhedaḥ sāmānyam ity etad yadi bhedas tadātmanā //177//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3174: 08817 yadi sāmānya-viśeṣayor yam ātmānam āśritya sāmānyaṃ viśeṣa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3175: 08818 iti sthitis tena ātmanā bhedas tadā bheda eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3177: 08819 tayoḥ svātmānau tau ced vyatirekiṇau vyatireka eva sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3182: 08823 vyatireke ca bheda-sāmānyayor na bhedaḥ sāmānyān na sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3185: 08826 yam ātmānaṃ puraskṛtya puruṣo ayaṃ pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3187: 08828 cintyete svātmanā bhedo vyāvṛttyā ca samānatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3188: 08901 asty eva vastu na anveti pravṛtty-ādi-prasaṅgataḥ //180 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3189: 08902 sarva eva gaur aśvād bhinno abhinno vā iti bhedam abhedaṃ vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3190: 08903 pṛcchan viśeṣam eva bhāvasya svabhāva-ākhyam adhikṛtya pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3198: 08907 pratyupasthāpitam arthaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā pṛcchann
SA15dhkpvsvu:3199: 08908 artha-antara-upakṣepeṇa tatra kim iti dvi-mukha-buddhiḥ kriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3200: 08909 tasmād yo asya ātmā ananya-sādhāraṇo yaṃ puraskṛtya puruṣo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3201: 08910 viśiṣṭa-arthakriyā-arthī pravartate yathā gor vāha-doha-ādau na anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3202: 08911 sambhavino arthasya yathā yuddha-praveśe sa eva svabhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3213: 08917 sāmānyasya ca vyāvṛtti-lakṣaṇasya svabhāva-bhūtasya ca sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3216: 08919 arthakriyā-arthī samaṃ dvayor api pravarteta / eko api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3219: 08921 tat tulyam iti so api kiṃ na karoti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3220: 08922 etena eva yad ahrīkāḥ kiṃ apy aślīlam ākulam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3222: 08924 yad ayam ahrīkaḥ syād uṣṭro dadhi syān na iti kim apy aślīlam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3223: 08925 ayuktam aheya-upādeyam apariniṣṭhānād ākulaṃ pralapanti / tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3227: 08928 codito dadhi khādeti kim uṣṭraṃ na abhidhāvati //182//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3228: 09001 tathā hy uṣṭro api syād dadhi na api sa eva uṣṭraḥ ye na anyo api syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3229: 09002 uṣṭraḥ / tathā dadhy api syād uṣṭraḥ na api tad eva dadhi yena anyad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3231: tad anayor ekasya api kasyacit tad-rūpa-abhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3232: 09004 abhāvāt svarūpasya vā atad-bhāvinaḥ sva-niyatasya abhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3234: dadhi khādeti codita uṣṭram api khādet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3235: 09006 atha asty atiśayaḥ kaścid yena bhedena vartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3236: 09007 sa eva dadhi so anyatra na asti ity anubhayaṃ param //183//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3237: 09008 atha anayoḥ kaścid atiśayo asti yena ayaṃ tathā coditaḥ kṣīra-vikāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3242: sa ca tādṛśaḥ svabhāvo anyatra na asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3244: 09012 arthinaḥ / tasmāt tan na ubhaya-rūpam ity ekānta-vādaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3246: 09014 sarvātmatve ca sarveṣāṃ bhinnau syātāṃ na dhī-dhvanī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3248: 09016 so ayam ahrīkaḥ kvacid apy ekam ākāraṃ pratiniyatam apaśyan
SA15dhkpvsvu:3252: 09019 vādo na syāt syād uṣṭro dadhi syān na iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3256: 09021 kvacit pratiniyamāt tat-pratibhāsa-bheda-kṛta eva tayo rūpayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3259: 09023 tathā ca na ekas tad-ubhaya-rūpaḥ syād iti mithyā-vāda
SA15dhkpvsvu:3260: 09024 eṣaḥ / sthitam etat na bhāvānāṃ kaścit svabhāva-anvayo asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3266: yeṣāṃ tu nirupākhyānāṃ svabhāva eva na asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3271: 09104 ayogāt / tathā ca sarvatra ayam anvaya-vyatireka-āśrayo vyavahāro
SA15dhkpvsvu:3272: 09105 na syāt uṣṇa-svabhāvo agnir na anuṣṇa ity api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3276: 09107 agni-svabhāvasya apratipattir iti vyāmūḍhaṃ jagat syāt / syād etat
SA15dhkpvsvu:3277: 09108 na tatra kasyacid asato niṣedhaḥ anuṣṇaṃ sad eva artha-antaraṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3281: 09110 asat tatra na asti iti deśa-kāla-dharma-niṣedha eva sarva-bhāveṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3286: yasmān na tatra api deśa-ādīnāṃ pratiṣedho
SA15dhkpvsvu:3290: 09115 api tulyo doṣo niṣedhād asati śabda-apravṛttir ity ādi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3296: na iha ghaṭo na idānīṃ na evam ity uktau
SA15dhkpvsvu:3297: 09118 na anena sambandho asti na etad dharmā vā iti pratītiḥ / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3300: 09120 asya sambandho dharmo vā na asti iti matir na bhavati / na ca asyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3301: 09121 kathaṃcid bhāve sambhavo abhāveṣu tathā abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3303: 09122 abhāva-pratīter na ayam iha ity ādyā pratītiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3308: sa eva hi śabdānāṃ na viṣayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3310: te cet pravṛttāḥ ko vacanasya niṣeddhā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3311: 09204 na hy avācyam arthaṃ buddhayaḥ samīhante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3318: 09207 api sambandhi-rūpa eva iti svarūpeṇa na abhidhīyate / tasmān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3319: 09208 na abhāva-vat sambandhe api prasaṅgaḥ / api ca / ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3320: 09209 abhāvam abhidheyaṃ bruvāṇaṃ prati pratividadhad abruvāṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3322: vacane vā asya katham abhāvo anuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3328: 09213 nirviṣayasya naño aprayoga ity atra uttaraṃ vakṣyate / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3333: 09217 na āśaṅkyā eva siddhās te vyavacchedasya vācakāḥ //185//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3334: 09218 vastu-vṛttīnāṃ śabdānāṃ kiṃ rūpam abhidheyam āhosvid bheda
SA15dhkpvsvu:3339: 09221 bhāvasya / tasmād ayam eva sa mukhyo vivekaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3340: 09222 tasya tathā abhāva-khyāpinaḥ śabdāḥ kiṃ viveka-viṣayā ity asthānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3342: tasmāt siddham etat sarve śabdā viveka-viṣayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3345: 09302 avadhi-bheda-upakalpitair bhedair bhinneṣv iva pratibhātsu buddhau
SA15dhkpvsvu:3350: 09305 hetur iti / sa ca ayaṃ hetutvena apadiśyamānaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3354: 09309 tena iyaṃ kṛtaka-śrutiḥ svabhāva-abhidhāyiny api para-upādhim enam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3356: 09311 upādhi-bheda-apekṣaḥ kvacit svabhāvo hetur ucyate kvacid anapekṣaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3357: 09312 sāmānyena yathā anityatva eva sattvam kvacit svabhāva-bhūta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3358: 09313 dharma-viśeṣa-parigraheṇa yathā tatra eva utpattiḥ / anayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3360: 09315 sattā-svabhāvo hetuś cen na sattā sādhyate katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3362: 09317 yadi sattvam anityatve anyatra vā hetuḥ syāt sādhyam api kasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3363: 09318 na iṣyate / tat kila evaṃ prasādhyamānaṃ viśeṣībhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3364: 09319 na ca viśeṣaḥ sādhāyituṃ śakyate ananvayāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3367: so ayaṃ viśeṣo na sādhya eva vyāhanyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3373: 09402 na kaścid arthaḥ siddhaḥ syād aniṣiddhaṃ ca tādṛśam //188//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3374: 09403 na sarvathā sattā-sādhane viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3376: 09404 viśeṣaṇo asti kaścid dharmī iti prasādhayato anirdiṣṭa-svabhāva-viśeṣasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3377: 09405 kasyacit sattā-mātre virodha-abhāvāt na iha sattā-sādhana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3378: 09406 pratiṣedhaḥ kiṃ tu sa tathā asti kaścid iti kaṃcana asya bhedam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3382: 09409 upātta-bhede sādhye asmin bhavad hetur ananvayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3383: 09410 sattāyāṃ tena sādhyāyāṃ viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavet //189//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3384: 09411 sa hi dharmī pradhāna-lakṣaṇa eko nityaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmako anyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3385: 09412 vā iti yathākathaṃcid api viśeṣitas tat-svabhāvaḥ prasādhito bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3387: yad api sattā-mātram anveti na tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3389: nanv evam agny-ādiṣv api prasaṅgaḥ / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3393: na vai sa ādhāras taṃ viśeṣīkaroti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3394: 09417 tad-ayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇād ity uktaṃ vakṣyate ca / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3396: 09419 na tathā iha api kvacit sattāyāḥ sādhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3398: 09420 eva arthasya kvacid abhāvān nirviśeṣaṇā eva sā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3403: tathā api kiṃ siddhaṃ syāt / anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3404: 09423 tu tad eva agni-sāmānyaṃ tatra asiddham iti sādhyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3406: 09424 tad-ayoga-virahiṇā sāmānyena anvayo na siddha eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3410: 09426 agni-nāntarīyako darśanīyo yatra dhūmas tatra agnir iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3412: 09427 mātreṇa vyāptaḥ siddho yatra eva svayaṃ dṛśyate tatra eva agni-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3414: tatra ca sādhya-nirdeśena na kiṃcit / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3419: 09504 siddhaḥ / arthād eva agnes tat-pradeśa-ayogaṃ vyavacchinatti iti sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3421: na punas tathā asya upanyāsa-pūrvako anvayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3426: 09508 liṅgasya avyabhicāras tu dharmeṇa anyatra darśyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3428: 09510 tasmān na agny-ādi-sādhana-vat sattā-sādhanam apy anavadyam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3439: 09518 dharmo viruddho abhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham //191//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3445: sa katham asiddha-sattāke syāt / yo hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3447: sa kathaṃ bhāvaṃ na icchet / svabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3448: 09603 eva hi kayācid apekṣayā dharma iti vyatirekī iva dharmiṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3450: na hi dharma-dharmi-vācinoḥ śabdayor vācye kaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3453: 09606 anāśrita-vastuno aparyudāsena vyatireka-mātrasya abhāve apy avirodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3454: 09607 yathā na bhavati mūrta iti amūrtatvaṃ nirupākhye api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3455: 09608 syāt / nirupākhyasya abhāvād na pratiṣedha-viṣayatā iti cet / tat kim
SA15dhkpvsvu:3461: 09611 etad vyavaccheda-mātraṃ dvayor api sambhavad vipakṣa-pracāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3463: 09613 kuryāt / sa ca svayaṃ sva-vāca-ubhaya-dharmatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ sato
SA15dhkpvsvu:3464: 09614 anyatra apy asya vṛttiṃ bhāṣate sattāyāṃ ca avyabhicāram iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3467: 09616 arthasya vyavacchedaṃ hetuṃ sattāyāṃ vadato asya viruddho
SA15dhkpvsvu:3468: 09617 hetuḥ syāt / tasya bhāve kvacid asambhavāt abhāve ca bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3470: tad ayaṃ triprakāro api dharmaḥ sattā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3471: 09619 sādhane na hetu-lakṣaṇa-bhāk na ca anyā gatir asti / tasmān na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3474: 09621 vastu-dharme siddha-sattāke dharmiṇi na asiddhiḥ / tena ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:3475: 09622 sādhya-dharmeṇa vyāptir yadi kathaṃcin niścīyate na virodha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3478: 09624 samāśraye vā tat-svabhāvatayā gamako na kaścid gamakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3481: 09701 vācyaḥ / na hi prakāśatayā prakāśayan pradīpas tad-rūpa-apratipattau
SA15dhkpvsvu:3485: 09705 tad-dharma-niścayād eva niścito vyāpakatvena tasya dharmiṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3488: 09708 tasya vyāpyasya dharmasya ayaṃ nivartako vyāpako dharmaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3490: evaṃ hy ayam asya vyāpakaḥ siddho
SA15dhkpvsvu:3491: 09710 bhavati yady asya abhāve na bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3494: 09712 hi prayogaḥ sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca / yathā āhur
SA15dhkpvsvu:3496: na anayor vastutaḥ kaścid bhedo anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3498: sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge arthād vaidharmya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3499: 09715 gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhyena hetor anvaya-abhāvāt / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3500: 09716 vaidharmye apy anvaya-gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhya-abhāve hetv-abhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3502: 09718 anityatve yathā kāryam akāryaṃ vā avināśini /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3505: 09720 tat sarvam anityam yathā ghaṭa-ādayaḥ śabdaś ca kṛtaka
SA15dhkpvsvu:3506: 09721 iti kṛtakatvasya apy anityatvena vyāptiṃ pradarśya śabdas ya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3507: 09722 kṛtakatve kathite sāmarthyād eva anityaḥ śabda iti / tasmān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3510: 09724 vyatireke api na anityatva-abhāve kṛtakatvaṃ bhavati śabdaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:3511: 09725 kṛtaka iti / siddha-tat-svabhāvatayā tad-abhāve na bhavataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3512: 09726 kṛtakatvasya śabde ca bhāva-khyātau tadātmanaḥ sato bhāva iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3513: 09727 sāmarthyāt siddheḥ pūrvavān na pratijñā-vacanam / anvayas tv
SA15dhkpvsvu:3516: 09802 nivṛttiḥ / tasmāt tan-niyamaṃ prasādhya nivṛttir vaktavyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3517: 09803 sā cet sidhyati tadātma-niyamam arthāt sūcayati iti siddho anvayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3518: 09804 katham idānīṃ kṛtako avaśyam anitya iti pratyetavyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3521: 09807 na hi bhāvā vinaśyantas tad-bhāve hetum apekṣante / sva-hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:3523: tasmād yaḥ kaścit kṛtakaḥ sa prakṛtyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3525: 09810 sāpekṣāṇāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ na avaśyaṃbhāvitā īkṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3529: 09813 bāhulye api hi tad-hetor bhavet kvacid asambhavaḥ //194//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3530: 09814 yady api bahulaṃ vināśa-kāraṇāni santi teṣām api sva-pratyaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3531: 09815 adhīna-saṃnidhitvān na avaśyaṃ saṃnidhānam iti kaścin na vinaśyed
SA15dhkpvsvu:3532: 09816 api / na hy avaśyaṃ hetavaḥ phalavanto vaikalya-pratibandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3537: tad ayaṃ bhāvo anapekṣas tad-bhāvaṃ prati
SA15dhkpvsvu:3540: nanv anapekṣāṇām api keṣāṃcit kvacin na avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3544: 09825 apekṣā / tatra apy antyā kāraṇa-sāmagrī yā avyavahitā kārya-utpatteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3549: na ca tāṃ tatra kaścit pratibandhuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3552: 09903 tadātmanaś ca apracyutasya tad-utpādanaṃ prati vaiguṇyaṃ kāraṇasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3554: 09905 yava-bīja-ādayo api śāly-aṅkure janye na sāpekṣāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3558: 09907 yāvatā sa eva eṣāṃ svabhāvo na asti yas tad-utpādanaḥ śāli-bījasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3561: 09909 satāṃ vā sa eva svabhāvo na asti yo vinaśvaraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3565: 09911 sva-hetor iti yo na tad-hetuḥ so atat-svabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3567: 09912 ca sa hetuḥ svarūpeṇa pratīta eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3571: 09914 ayogāt tathā atra api niyama-hetur vaktavyo yata ime kecin
SA15dhkpvsvu:3572: 09915 naśvara-ātmano jātā na ca atra kaścin niyāmakaḥ svabhāvasya asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3574: janmi-svabhāvo nāśī iti cet / na vai
SA15dhkpvsvu:3575: 09917 janma nāśi-svabhāvasya hetuḥ na ca ahetoḥ svabhāva-niyamaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3576: 09918 tasmān na atra kaścid hetoḥ svabhāva-pravibhāgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3578: 09919 phalasya api na asti ity asamānam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3580: 09920 kvacit kadācic ca bhāva-virodhinī tad-abhāvaṃ svabhāvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3581: 09921 sādhayati / yo hi svabhāvo nirapekṣaḥ sa yadi kadācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3582: 09922 bhavet kvacid vā tat-kāla-dravya-apekṣa iti nirapekṣa eva na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3584: sa tarhi naśvaraḥ svabhāvo nirapekṣa iti ahetukaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3585: 09924 syāt / na ahetukaḥ sattā-hetor eva bhāvāt tathā-utpatteḥ / sato
SA15dhkpvsvu:3592: tad hi kiṃcid upalīyeta na vā yasya yatra kiṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:3596: tasmān na iyam ākasmikī kvacit / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3599: 10003 uktaṃ ca atra na vināśo nāma anya eva kaścid bhāvāt svabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3600: 10004 eva hi nāśaḥ sa eva hy eka-kṣaṇa-sthāyī jāta iti / tam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3601: 10005 mandāḥ svabhāvam ūrdhvaṃ vyavasyanti na prāk darśane api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3602: 10006 pāṭava-abhāvād iti tad-vaśena paścād vyavasthāpyate vikāra-darśanena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3604: tad ayaṃ sattā-vyatirekeṇa na anyat kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3611: 10012 siddhe hi bhāve kārako na taṃ karoti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3615: 10014 iti / kathaṃ kriyā-pratiṣedho vināśa iti hi te bhāva-abhāvaṃ manyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3616: 10015 tad ayaṃ vināśa-hetur abhāvaṃ karoti iti prāptam / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3617: 10016 yady abhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ syāt svabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāva iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3619: tasmād abhāvaṃ karoti iti bhāvaṃ na karoti iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3622: 10019 kim iti apekṣyata iti siddhā vināśaṃ praty anapekṣayā bhāvasya /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3625: 10022 yatra nāma bhavaty asmād anyatra api svabhāvataḥ //196//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3626: 10023 so ayaṃ kvacid bhavan dṛṣṭo anapekṣatvāt svabhāvata eva bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3627: 10024 tathā anyatra api svabhāva-bhāvī viśeṣa-abhāvād iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3628: 10025 yā kācid bhāva-viṣayā dvidhā eva anumitis tataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3630: 10028 tasmāt dviprakārā eva vastu-viṣaya-anumitiḥ kārya-liṅgā svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3631: 10101 liṅgā ca / yathāsvaṃ vyāpini sādhye tayor eva pratibandhāt liṅgayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:3635: 10105 tṛtīyas tu hetur anupalabdhir aviśeṣeṇa kvacid arthe gamaka ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:3636: 10106 ucyate / san-niścaya-śabda-vyavahāra-pratiṣedhe hi sarvā eva anupalabdhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3641: tac ca pratipattṛ-vaśān na vastu-vaśāt / tāvad hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3642: 10110 sa bhāvo asya na asti yāvad atra apratipattiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3644: 10111 vastutas tv anupalabhyamāno na san na asan / satām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3645: 10112 api svabhāva-ādi-viprakarṣāt kadācid anupalambhāt tasya asatsv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3646: 10113 tulyatvāt / tad etat pratipattuḥ pramāṇa-abhāvān nivṛttaṃ sattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3648: 10115 tena yā api iyam anupalabdhir upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3655: na hy asti sambhavo yad upalabdhi-yogyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3656: 10119 sakaleṣv anyeṣu kāraṇeṣu san na upalabhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3660: 10122 aliṅgāś ca kathaṃ teṣām abhāvo anupalabdhitaḥ //199//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3661: 10123 so ayam asattāṃ sādhayann anupalabdhi-mātreṇa sarva-arthānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3672: 10207 kāla-vyavahitā vā prakaraṇa-anupayogino dravya-viśeṣā na tān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3682: 10213 sad-asan-niścaya-phalā na iti syād vā apramāṇatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3683: 10214 na eva vā iyam anupalabdhiḥ pramāṇaṃ vyavasāya-phalatvāt pramāṇānām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3684: 10215 na hi pravṛtti-niṣedhe api iyaṃ niḥśaṅka-paricchedaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3686: saṃśayād api kvacil lokasya pravṛtteḥ / tathātve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3687: 10217 tan niravadyaṃ yadi niścaya-pūrvaṃ vyavahared iti sā iyam apravṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3693: yat punar uktam apramāṇam anupalabdhir iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3695: 10301 yasya kasyacit svabhāvo na upalabhyate deśa-ādi-viprakarṣāt na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3696: 10302 sa tad-anupalambha-mātreṇa asan nāma yathoktaṃ prāk / yo api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3697: 10303 jñāpakasya liṅgasya abhāvād atīndriyaḥ pratikṣipyate arthaḥ svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3698: 10304 viśeṣo vā yathā na asti viraktaṃ ceto devatā-viśeṣo vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3699: 10305 na asti dāna-hiṃsā-virati-cetanānām abhyudaya-hetutā iti pratyakṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:3700: 10306 apy arthe phalasya ānantarya-abhāvād atat-phala-sādharmyād viparyasto
SA15dhkpvsvu:3701: 10307 apavadeta api na tāvatā tad-abhāva eva vyavahitānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3712: 10315 kārye tu kāraka-ajñānam abhāvasya eva sādhakam //201//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3713: 10316 svabhāva-abhāve sādhye tad-anupalambha eva apramāṇam ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3718: 10319 dṛṣṭā / na brūmaḥ kāraṇa-sthiti-kāla-bhāvī kāryam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3720: 10320 tu bhāva-utpattir na asti ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3721: na ca tathā sthāyī bhāvas tad-upādānaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3723: 10322 yady asya kathaṃcid abhāvaḥ sidhyet tat-phalaṃ na asti iti niścīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3725: 10324 svabhāva-abhāva eva liṅgini svabhāva-anupalambho api kaścit pramāṇam eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3726: 10325 eva yady anupalabhyamāno vyāpakaḥ svabhāvo asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3730: 10401 yady asya kāraṇasya svabhāvasya vyāpakasya vā abhāvaḥ kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3735: 10404 katham idānīṃ bhāvasya svayam anupalabdher abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3739: 10408 bhāvo hi yadi bhaved yathāsvaṃ grāhakeṇa karaṇena upalabhya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3740: 10409 eva bhavet / sa darśana-pratibandhiṣu vyavadhāna-ādiṣv asatsu upalabhya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3741: 10410 eva / anupalabdhas tv asann iti niścīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3748: 10415 yo hi bhāvo yena saha na avatiṣṭhate tad-upādānayor anyonya-vaiguṇya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3749: 10416 āśrayatvena ārambha-virodhāt tayor viruddhayor ekasya bhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3753: tata eva virodha-gater virodhāc ca abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3754: 10419 sādhanāt / bhavatu nāma evaṃvidhāyā anupalabdher abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3758: na hy asyāṃ kaścid dṛṣṭānto asti / kiṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3763: 10424 katham adṛṣṭāntikā asattā-siddhiḥ sadṛṣṭāntatve vā anavasthā-prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3772: 10429 etān sādhayati iti sva-nimitta-sāmagrī-yogya-saṃnidhānaḥ sarvo atra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3773: 10501 dṛṣṭāntaḥ / asattā punar atra anupalabdhir eva /

SA15dhkpvsvu:4612: 12527 tat kiṃcit kutaścid āgatam ity ekasya upadeṣṭuḥ prabandhena abhāvād

SA15dhkpvsvu:4672: 12711 ca / varṇa-aviśeṣe api vākya-bhedāt pratipatti-bhedaḥ kārya-bhedaḥ

SA15dhkpvsvu:4977: 13424 tulya-upayoga iti dhvanibhir aśakya-sādhanaṃ kāryam / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4979: tasmān na varṇeṣu vākye vā apauruṣeyatā /

SA15dhkpvsvu:4981: 13501 na artha-antaram eva śabda-rūpaṃ vākyam apauruṣeyam / kiṃ tarhi /

SA15dhkpvsvu:4993: 13508 yady akṛtaka-anupūrvī varṇānāṃ te ca na bahavaḥ samāna-jātīyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4994: 13509 yena kecid vyavasthita-kramāḥ syuḥ anye yathā iṣṭa-parāvṛttayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4995: 13510 kiṃ tarhi eka eva trailokye akāras tathā gakāraḥ tadā agnir ity

SA15dhkpvsvu:5013: 13521 sā ca iyam ānupūrvī vārṇānāṃ deśa-kṛtā vā syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5024: 13603 ca / tathā kāla-parihāreṇa vṛttiḥ kāla-paurvāparyam / yadā eko
SA15dhkpvsvu:5026: tad api nityeṣu na sambhavati / sarvadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5031: 13607 anitya-avyāpitāyāṃ ca doṣaḥ prāg eva kīrtitaḥ //260//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5032: 13608 atha mā bhūd ayaṃ doṣa ity anityān avyāpinaś ca varṇān icchet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5033: 13609 tāv api pakṣau prāg eva nirākṛtāv ity aparihāraḥ /

SA15dhkpvsvu:5630: 15014 bhavantu nāma apauruṣeyā vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ tathā api sambhāvyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:5648: 15024 ekatra yathārtha-jñāna-hetavo api sarvatra tathā bhavanti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5649: 15025 tathā śabdānām apy apauruṣeyatve apy ubhayaṃ syād iti / bhavatu
SA15dhkpvsvu:5651: 15027 na punar nityeṣu śabdeṣv etad asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5653: 15028 apy asty eva dharmas teṣām api saṃketa-balād anyathā-vṛtteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5654: 15029 kārya-janana-svabhāva-sthitau ca eṣāṃ samaya-āder apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5655: 15101 tataḥ pratītir artheṣu sarvasya sarvadā syāt / na ca asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5656: 15102 tasmān na śabdāḥ sthita-svabhāvā iti / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5657: 15103 na jñāna-hetutā eva syāt tasminn akṛtake mate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5658: 15104 nityebhyo avastu-sāmarthyān na hi janma asti kasyacit //285//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5659: 15105 yady akṛtakaḥ śabdo na tasmād artheṣu pratītir eva syāt / pratīti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5662: evam ayaṃ janako na evam iti vivecanīyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5664: na yādṛśo asya ajanakas tādṛśa eva janako
SA15dhkpvsvu:5669: 15111 kārya-sātatya-adarśanāc ca na te kathaṃcit kartāra ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:5671: yā apy etā nitya-abhimateṣv ākāśa-ādiṣu pratipattayas
SA15dhkpvsvu:5672: 15113 tā api na tat-svabhāva-bhāvinyaḥ / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5674: 15115 jāyante buddhayas tatra kevalaṃ na artha-gocarāḥ //286//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5676: 15117 iti tasmin saty asyāḥ kāraṇe yogye sā bhavaty eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5677: 15118 tad yadi nityānāṃ padārthānāṃ svalakṣaṇe kasyacit jñānaṃ syāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:5683: 15122 bhāvaḥ kenacid gṛhyamāṇas tat-kāraṇa-apekṣo yadi grahaṇam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5684: 15123 janayet yuktaṃ yat tena eva gṛhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5687: sarveṇa samaṃ gṛhyeta na vā kenacid iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5688: 15125 san kenacid dṛṣṭo na nityaḥ kaścid atīndriyaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5690: 15126 tasmād artha-sāmarthya-anapekṣāḥ samāropita-gocarā āntaram eva upādānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5696: 15202 eva iti / na hy agnir himasya bheṣajam ity ādiṣu śīta-pratighāta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5697: 15203 sāmarthyaṃ loka-prasiddhaṃ agneḥ khyāpyata iti sarvaṃ tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5699: 15205 lokaḥ sva-saṃketam anuvidadhad evaṃ pratyeti āhosvic śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5702: 15207 śabdāḥ punar anyatra anyathā dṛśyanta iti loka-prasiddhy-anuvidhāne
SA15dhkpvsvu:5705: 15209 darśane api sarveṣāṃ tathābhāvo na sidhyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5707: 15210 api hy eṣāṃ kaścin mithyā-artha-niyato api syād iti svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5709: 15212 mithyātvaṃ kṛtakeṣv eva dṛṣṭam ity akṛtaṃ vacaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5711: 15214 atha yan mithyā-arthaṃ vacanaṃ tad akhilaṃ kṛtakam iti hetu-vyatirekeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:5713: 15216 satya-artham iti syād vinā apy anvayena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5717: 15218 asti / asambhave ca vijātīyasya gaty-antara-abhāvād iṣṭa-artha-siddhes
SA15dhkpvsvu:5723: 15222 hetāv asambhave anukte bhāvas tasya api śaṅkyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5725: 15224 yadi hetoḥ sādhya-vipakṣe abhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā sādhya-vyatirekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5731: na ca ekatra dṛṣṭasya anyatra asambhava
SA15dhkpvsvu:5737: 15301 na asattā-siddhir ity uktaṃ sarvato anupalambhanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5739: 15303 na hy ayaṃ puruṣa-mātrakaḥ sarvaṃ draṣṭuṃ samartho yena asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5742: 15305 na vyabhicarati sa evaṃ bruvāṇaḥ śobheta adarśanān na asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5743: 15306 tad ime svabhāva-deśa-kāla-viprakarṣeṇa santo apy anupalakṣyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5746: 15308 vā sarva-darśī vacanasya akṛtakasya itarasya vā vibhāvayituṃ samarthaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5747: 15309 pratipāditaṃ ca etat kvacit tathā dṛṣṭānām apy arthānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5748: 15310 punaḥ kathaṃcid anyathābhāvaḥ yathā kvacid deśe madhurāṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:5750: 15312 ca idānīm atad-darśinā tāni pratikṣeptavyāny eva iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5752: 15313 ca syād syān mithyā-arthaṃ ca iti na virodhaṃ paśyāmaḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:5753: 15314 hi iyam anupalabdhir adṛśya-ātmasv abhāva-sādhikā ity uktam / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:5754: 15315 yat kiṃcin mithyā-arthaṃ tat sarvaṃ pauruṣeyam ity aniścayād
SA15dhkpvsvu:5756: 15317 anvayo vyatireko vā sattvaṃ vā sādhya-dharmiṇi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5759: ya eva tu ubhaya-niścita-vācī sa sādhanam dūṣaṇam
SA15dhkpvsvu:5761: 15321 iti / ko hy adṛṣṭa-virodhasya sambhavaṃ pratyācakṣīta / tad ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5764: 15324 sa eva asya sapakṣaḥ syāt sarvo hetur ato anvayī //291//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5765: 15401 yat kiṃcin mithyā-arthaṃ tat sarvaṃ pauruṣeyam iti hetu-vipakṣeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:5766: 15402 sādhya-vipakṣasya vyāptis tad-abhāve abhāva-siddhau syāt / tad-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:5770: 15405 pratiṣedha-dvayāc ca vidhi-siddhir iti kā ananvaya-avyatireka-vyāpti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5771: 15406 siddhiḥ / tan na kaścid hetur ananvayo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5782: 15411 rūpatvāt / abhāva-rūpas tu vyatirekaḥ sa ca vyatiricyamāno
SA15dhkpvsvu:5783: 15412 bhāvam upasthāpayati na evaṃ nairātmya-ādayaḥ svabhāva-viśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5788: 15415 mātram anyathā nirupākhye kṛtakatva-ādy-ayogān na tato nairātmya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5795: 15419 tasya bhāva-rūpa-vyavacchede na bhāva-siddhiḥ syād iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5797: tathā anairātmye api na bhāva-siddhiḥ / yathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5798: 15421 na idaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇa-ādimattvād iti vipakṣayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:5800: 15423 dṛṣṭam / tad-abhāve ca na asti iti svayaṃ na bhavad api prāṇa-ādīnāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5813: 15430 siddhāv api tad-asiddhir iti sādhye api prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5819: 15502 dvairāśye tu śabdānām etat syād eka-nivṛttau gaty-antara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5820: 15503 abhāvāt / te tv anarthakā api syur iti na iṣṭasiddhiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5828: 15507 tathā ayam anarthakeṣv artha-vikalpaḥ puruṣa-kṛtaḥ na tu śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5830: 15509 na hi prakṛtyā prakāśanās tam apekṣante vahny-ādayaḥ / puruṣas
SA15dhkpvsvu:5831: 15510 tu sva-samaya-vyāpāram ācakṣāṇa upadiśati iti nyāyyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5833: 15512 ca eko naisargiko anyas tu pauruṣeya iti duravasānam / asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5843: 15518 arthavattā pauruṣeyī ca syāt pramāṇa-anurodhinī ca / api
SA15dhkpvsvu:5844: 15519 ca idaṃ mantrā apauruṣeyāś ca iti vyāhataṃ paśyāmaḥ / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5846: 15521 yuktam / yady ete mantrāḥ kasyacit samayo yathā mat-praṇītam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5848: 15523 anena arthena yojayāmi iti parārtha-paratā-anurodhena anyato vā kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:5849: 15524 hetoḥ kṛtaḥ syāt tadā mantra-prayogāt kadācit artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5851: 15526 atha api bhāva-śaktiḥ syād anyatra apy aviśeṣataḥ //292//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5854: 15528 svabhāva eṣa yad ime kathaṃcin niyuktāḥ phaladāḥ / tat tarhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:5855: 15601 rūpaṃ varṇānāṃ sarvatra aviśiṣṭam iti yathākathaṃcit prayuktād
SA15dhkpvsvu:5857: varṇā eva hi mantro na anyat kiṃcit / tat-kramo
SA15dhkpvsvu:5859: 15604 kramasya arthāntaratvaṃ ca pūrvam eva nirākṛtam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5860: 15605 na varṇa-vyatirikto anyaḥ krama iti niveditam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5863: te ca aviśiṣṭāḥ sarvatra iti sarvadā phaladāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5864: 15607 syuḥ / upaplavas tv alpīyaso api kramasya bhraṃśād dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5866: 15609 ca / sarva-bhraṃśe tu kasyacid eva samayasya ananuṣṭhānād asaṃnidher
SA15dhkpvsvu:5869: 15611 vā varṇa-ātmanas tat-krama-ātmano vā mantrasya artha-hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:5872: 15614 yato hi bhāva-śakteḥ phala-utpattiḥ sā avikalā iti na phala-vaikalyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5873: 15615 syāt / na hi kāraṇa-sākalye kārya-vaikalyaṃ yuktam / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5878: 15619 yadi mantrā vidhānād anyato vā kaṃcit svabhāva-atiśayam āsādayeyuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5882: tat kim ayam asamartho apekṣyata ity anapekṣāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5883: 15622 sadā kuryur na vā kadācid anatiśayāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5884: 15623 sarvasya sādhanaṃ te syur bhāva-śaktir yad īdṛśī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5886: 15625 yadi bhāva-śaktayā eva mantrāḥ siddhi-pradā na te kaṃcit parihareyur
SA15dhkpvsvu:5888: na hy anyaṃ prati svabhāvo atad-bhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:5889: 15627 bhavati / tasya tena anapakarṣaṇād anyena ca anutkarṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5892: 15702 abhāvāt / ata eva asya asaṃskāryatvāt prayoktā api na asti / ataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5894: 15704 saṃskāryasya api bhāvasya vastu-bhedo hi bhedakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5895: 15705 prayoktṛ-bhedān niyamaḥ śaktau na samaye bhavet //295//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5903: 15709 prāyam / tad ime mantrāḥ svabhāva-atiśayāt phaladāyinaḥ kāryā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5904: 15710 api na śūdra-ādi-prayoge apy anyathā syuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5913: 15715 na tadvad anayoḥ kaṃcid api guṇaṃ viniyataṃ paśyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5917: 15717 bheda-anvayo loke pratīti-bhedaḥ so asaty api jāti-bhede vyāpāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5919: 15719 tad ime aviśiṣṭena prayujyamānā mantrās tato aviśiṣṭam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:5921: tena aviśeṣeṇa eva phaladāḥ syuḥ / yadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5922: 15721 tu samayād ebhyaḥ phalaṃ tadā ayam adoṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5929: yad api prayoktā phalam aśnuta iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5934: 15728 yena tataḥ kaścit phalam aśnute anyo na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5935: 15729 prayogo yady abhivyaktiḥ sā prāg eva nirākṛtā //296//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5936: 15801 na hi nityānāṃ kācid abhivyaktir ity uktam yato abhivyañjakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5938: 15803 vyaktiś ca buddhiḥ sā yasmāt sa phalair yadi yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5939: 15804 syāc śrotaḥ phala-sambandho vaktā hi vyakti-kāraṇam //297//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5940: 15806 na hi śabdasya anyataḥ svarūpa-pariṇāmo vyaktir na apy āvaraṇa-vigamanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5941: 15807 kiṃ tu tad-viṣayā pratītir aśrūyamāṇe avyakta-vyapadeśāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5942: 15808 tatra yadi buddhi-hetur vaktā syāt tat tulyaṃ śrotary api iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5947: 15811 na vaktur iti viśeṣa iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5956: tac ca na śakyam tasya kathaṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:5959: 15816 śrāvayaty ahaṃ śrāvayāmi iti tayoḥ pratyayād vaktṛ-śrotṛ-bheda
SA15dhkpvsvu:5960: 15817 iti cet / anupakārya-upakārakād bhrānti-mātrāt tad-bhāve atiprasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5965: 15820 prasaṅgāt / bhrāntir api kutaścid upakāre sati kayācit pratyāsattyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5967: sa apy atyanta-anupakāre na syāt / tasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:5971: 15825 manojapo vā vyarthaḥ syāc śabdo hi śrotra-gocaraḥ //298//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5975: na brūmaḥ śabda eva iti / śabdas tv
SA15dhkpvsvu:5976: 15828 avaśyaṃ tal-lakṣaṇas tasya lakṣaṇa-antara-abhāvāt / tatra yadi
SA15dhkpvsvu:5978: 15901 śruti-viṣayāṇāṃ karaṇānāṃ prayoktā jāpī na mantra-phalena
SA15dhkpvsvu:5980: na hi tadā śrotreṇa kaṃcid arthaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5983: 15904 pāraṃparyeṇa tajjatvāt tad-vyaktiḥ sā api cen matiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5984: 15905 na hi manasā dhyāyato api mantra-ābhāsā buddhiḥ śabda-śravaṇād
SA15dhkpvsvu:5985: 15906 ṛte / tataḥ śabda-prabhavāt sā api śabda-vyaktir eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5987: 15907 syāt / śabda-artha-vikalpānām api paraṃparayā prasūtir asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5990: 15910 tathā syus tad-arthā ced asiddhaṃ kalpanā-anvayāt //299//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5991: 15911 na brūmaḥ sarvā śabda-prabhavā buddhis tad-vyaktir iti / yā tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:5994: 15913 asiddham / na hi svalakṣaṇe vikalpānāṃ vṛttir iti nivedayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5995: 15914 te hi yathāsvam āntarād vikalpa-vāsanā-prabodhād anapekṣita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5998: 15916 na hi yo yasya sattā-upadhānaṃ na apekṣate sa tasya hetuḥ / ahetuś
SA15dhkpvsvu:6004: atra apy uktaṃ śrotary api prasaṅga
SA15dhkpvsvu:6005: 15920 iti / taj-jñāne ca prayoge śabdaḥ puruṣe vyāpriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6009: 15922 puruṣaḥ śabdānāṃ prayoktā ity alaukiko ayaṃ vyavahāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6016: 15929 samayam ārocayet yathā-samayaṃ ca arthaṃ niṣpādayed iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:6020: yad uktaṃ na varṇebhyo anyā kācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:6022: 16004 ānupūrvyām asatyāṃ syāt saro rasa iti śrutau /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6024: 16006 na hi saro rasa ity ādi-pādeṣu kaścid varṇa-bhedo na ca varṇa-vyatiriktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:6027: 16008 pratibhāṃ paśyāmaḥ ānupūrvīm eva ca atulyām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6030: tasmād asti sā bhedavatī yato ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:6037: 16016 apekṣya tat-smṛtiṃ paścād ādhatte smṛtim ātmani //303//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6054: 16107 anyad eva tato rūpaṃ tad varṇānāṃ padaṃ padam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6056: 16109 tasmān na khalv eka eva padeṣu varṇānāṃ svabhāvaḥ kartṛ-citta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6060: 16112 sā ca ānupūrvī varṇānāṃ pravṛttā racana-ākṛtaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6063: 16115 ity uktam / sā ca puruṣa-vitarka-vicāra-kṛtā iti na sthita-kramā
SA15dhkpvsvu:6067: 16118 ādīnāṃ bīja-aṅkura-ādīnāṃ ca sva-icchayā krama-racanā śakyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:6068: 16119 kartum / tata eva puruṣa-dharma-saṃkhyāte vikalpa-anukrame sati
SA15dhkpvsvu:6072: 16123 sati indhane dāha-vṛtter asaty abhāvād adṛṣṭa-indhano api dahano
SA15dhkpvsvu:6076: 16201 api varṇa-anukramaḥ puruṣa-vikalpaṃ yadi na apekṣeta nirālambanaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6083: 16204 atad-viśiṣṭasya ca atat-kṛtau sarvatra kāryakāraṇabhāvaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:6088: sarve api ghaṭa-ādayo bhāvāḥ kṛtrimā akṛtrimā
SA15dhkpvsvu:6092: 16208 ca / tān api hi para-kriyā-darśana-pūrvakam eva anyaḥ karoty avidita
SA15dhkpvsvu:6093: 16209 kartāraś ca kecid iti sarveṣāṃ keṣāṃcid vā akriyā-abhiniveśo astu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6094: 16210 tasmāt sarvā eva iyaṃ varṇa-ānupūrvī prasiddha-kāryakāraṇabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6098: 16214 ayaṃ kramo varṇānāṃ viṣa-nirghāta-ādi-samartho na anya iti yady
SA15dhkpvsvu:6099: 16215 anyo api jānīyat taṃ tathā eva pratipadyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6101: 16216 ayam anukramaḥ svabhāvato api kārya-kṛt kaiścid eva vijñāta ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:6104: 16218 na ayam iti śakyam unnetum asaṃkīrṇasya liṅga-viśeṣasya asiddheḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6106: 16220 upadeśe api kathaṃcit svabhāva-viveka-apratīter anyatra kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6107: 16221 saṃvādāt tasya ca karaṇāt prāg draṣṭum aśakyatvāt / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:6108: 16222 ca ayam anukramaḥ svabhāvataḥ kārakaḥ kasyacid āśu-siddher
SA15dhkpvsvu:6117: 16227 tu sva-icchā-pravṛttiḥ sattva-sabhāgatā-ādi-vaśāt sā iva aviśeṣād vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:6118: 16301 kaṃcid anugṛhṇāti na aparam iti yuktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6128: 16306 dharma-svabhāva iti ca yathāvasaraṃ nivedayiṣyāmaḥ / maitrī-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6129: 16307 śauca-dharma-parāyaṇānāṃ ca tan-nimittam eva kasyāścid siddher
SA15dhkpvsvu:6132: 16309 sa tad-virodhī dharmo yukto adharmaś ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6136: 16311 tad iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ vrata-āder vipāko api tu pūrvasya karmaṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6140: 16314 prayogas tasya iṣṭa-phalasya karmaṇaḥ kathaṃcid upakārāt pācakaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:6143: 16316 dharmā sa dharmas tena kṛtaḥ sa tathā tad-ārādhanena phalati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6145: 16318 vinā api puruṣeṇa tad-upakārāt phalam iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6155: 16323 ye api tantravidaḥ kecin mantrān kāṃścana kurvate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6157: 16325 rathyā-puruṣā api kecana tantrajñāḥ svayaṃ-kṛtair mantraiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6159: tathā anyo apy anatiśayaś ca kartā ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:6163: 16328 hi te samayam anupālayantas tad-upadeśena ca vartamānāḥ samarthāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6170: 16403 eva ananya-sādhāraṇa-śaktitvād iti puruṣa-viśeṣa eva samarthitaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6171: 16404 kṛtakāḥ pauruṣeyāś ca vācyā mantrāḥ phala-īpsunā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6172: 16405 na hy akṛtakānāṃ prayogaḥ sambhavati na ca aprayuktebhyaḥ
